snippet: Shoppers in California had accused the retailer of running a “massive” campaign to trick them into believing that they were getting big discounts.
abstract: JC Penney Company says it will pay $50 million to settle class-action lawsuit by California shoppers; shoppers claim retailer was falsely advertising heavy discounts on apparel and accessories.
lead_paragraph: Shoppers in California had accused the retailer of running a “massive” campaign to trick them into believing that they were getting big discounts.

headline.main: J.C. Penney Settles Shoppers’ Suit Over False Advertising
headline.print_headline: J.C. Penney Settles for $50 Million a Suit Claiming False Advertising on Discounts
